word_mean: 食物不足，营养不足：长期(通常数周到数月)食物严重匮乏而造成的病症，其特征是明显虚弱，体重极度降低和代谢低下

sentence.Network_en: Chronic poisoning may lead to death from inanition.
sentence.Network_cn: 慢性中毒也可能由虚弱导致死亡.

sentence.Network_en: Because nutrition has been used up big, inanition is caused.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为营养消耗过大, 营养不足造成.

sentence.Network_en: Remedy some inanition on soul a bit.
sentence.Network_cn: 弥补一些些心灵上的空虚.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin inanitio(n-), from Latin inanire 'make empty', from inanis 'empty, vain'

means.word_mean: 1. weakness characterized by a lack of vitality or energy
2. exhaustion resulting from lack of food
